events.message: I placed my order over two weeks ago and the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't been updated in days.
The system identified the complaint regarding shipment tracking and late delivery as a Delivery Delay issue.
Support agent Sarah M. has been assigned to handle the late delivery case for customer order #789456.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your delayed shipment. Could you please confirm your order number?
To assist you better, could you provide the tracking number and any recent updates you may have seen?
Sure, my tracking number is 1234567890, but the last update was almost a week ago saying the item left the warehouse.
Thank you for the info. I will contact the courier for an update and keep you posted shortly. Meanwhile, please check if your delivery address is correct.
I have double-checked, and the address is correct. Thank you for looking into this for me.
As we have not received a timely response from the courier, I am escalating this matter to our logistics team for urgent review.
The courier confirmed the package was misplaced but is now rerouted for delivery and will arrive within 2 days.
We are checking in to confirm you have received your package and to ensure everything is satisfactory with your order.
Yes, I received the package yesterday, and everything is perfect now. Thanks so much for your help!
We are closing this case as resolved. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on how well we handled your delivery delay issue.
